methodology: Only includes counts verified from official government sources. Each source entry includes the URL, institution name, and date of last verification. 'known_count' is null when no official census exists for that category.

federal_leyes_vigentes.notes: Complete catalog of federal laws and codes currently in force.

state_legislativo.notes: State-level legislation from all 32 states via OJN. 782 permanent dead links (Michoacán 504, EDOMEX 141, SLP 47, others <30 each). Remaining 975 gap = 12120 - 11363 - 782 = difference likely in low-count states.

gap_investigation.findings: OJN severely undercounts 3 states. State congress portals confirmed: BC ~340 laws (vs OJN 3), Durango ~160 (vs 1), QR ~356 (vs 1). Hidalgo OJN shows 38 but 740+ already scraped. Recovery requires state-specific scrapers.

state_non_legislativo.notes: State-level regulations from executive, judicial, and autonomous bodies. 18,439 of 22,877 downloaded (80.6%). Permanent failures: Michoacán 2,291, SLP ~700, Baja California ~200, EDOMEX ~600. 3 states returned 0 laws (CDMX, Durango, Zacatecas).

municipal.notes: No authoritative census of municipal legislation exists. INEGI reports 2,468 municipalities. Only 5 tier-1 city portals have been scraped so far.

federal_reglamentos.notes: Federal regulations implementing specific laws. Spider discovered 150 reglamentos (page lists 137; extras from alternate PDF path conventions). All 150 scraped and ingested.

federal_noms.notes: Normas Oficiales Mexicanas. No definitive count available; estimated 4,000+ across all secretarías.

conamer_cnartys.source_name: CONAMER CNARTyS - Catálogo Nacional de Regulaciones
conamer_cnartys.notes: National regulatory catalog including all types of federal and state secondary instruments. Count may overlap with other sources.

judicial_jurisprudencia.source_name: SCJN - Semanario Judicial de la Federación
judicial_jurisprudencia.notes: Binding judicial precedent (jurisprudencia por reiteración, contradicción, sustitución). Count is for 10th epoch.

judicial_tesis_aisladas.notes: Non-binding isolated court opinions. Estimated count across all epochs.

international_treaties.notes: Bilateral and multilateral treaties ratified by Mexico. Per SCJN, these sit above federal laws in the hierarchy.

leyes_vigentes.label: Leyes Legislativas Vigentes
leyes_vigentes.description: Federal laws (Cámara de Diputados) + state laws from Poder Legislativo (OJN). This is the most comparable apples-to-apples metric.

marco_juridico_completo.label: Marco Jurídico Completo
marco_juridico_completo.description: All known legislation including state executive/judicial/autonomous body regulations. Municipal excluded due to unknown universe.

normatividad_primaria.label: Normatividad Primaria (Tiers 1-4)
normatividad_primaria.description: All legislation from federal, state (all powers), and municipal levels. Excludes secondary regulations, judicial corpus, and treaties.
normatividad_primaria.notes: Universe count excludes municipal (unknown universe). Actual universe is 36,116 + unknown municipal.

marco_juridico_total.label: Marco Jurídico Total (All Tiers)
marco_juridico_total.description: Entire known Mexican legal framework across all 7 tiers: legislation, secondary regulations, judicial corpus, and international treaties.
marco_juridico_total.notes: Universe is approximate. Municipal count unknown. CONAMER count may overlap with federal_reglamentos and federal_noms. Judicial count includes all epochs.
